Server Error.\n\nTry again by pressing back and restarting the map.
To start mapping,\n please hit record for the first time.

1. To begin mapping, simply press the button below. 
 
2. When ready, press the record button near the bottom of the screen to take the first sample 
 
3. The application will then record for 30 seconds, during which time, you should stay in the vicinity of when you clicked the button (an indicator will appear) 
 
4. After the recording is uploaded the server will process the file and eventually send you a new target. Approach this target until you are in it's vicinity, and you can once again press the record button. 
 
5. Keep repeating 3 and 4 to build a map on the Sound Map server! Thank you for helping out. 
 
Note: You can enter debug mode by clicking the 'Rec' badge in the lower right-hand corner. This will lift some of the process checks, such as being within the vicinity of the target, and reveals a numerical indication if audio.
